name: Chompit League
description:
Dan receives a new game that he's been waiting a long time for, then Jeff wanders in to find Dan playing it.

A calamitous event occurs after the game is pushed too far, forcing Jeff and Dan to fight for their lives.

When the carnage is over, Dan has the idea of a lifetime.

This was created for the game jam Giant Rom 4 by...

me (AutumnShade1 on Giant Bomb)

https://plastic-diamond.itch.io/

with 2D art created by JoeSpectacles (on Giant Bomb)

https://itch.io/profile/joewithspectacles
